body_content.explanation: not having been frozen, or no longer frozen:
examples: If you have fresh (unfrozen) turkeys available at your market, buy one of those.
Check that your animals always have access to clean, unfrozen water.

body_content.explanation: (of money, bank accounts, etc.) available for use again after previously not being allowed or able to be used:
examples: According to records of his assets, only about £200m remains unfrozen.
Her family collected $26 million from unfrozen assets.

body_content.explanation: (of pay or prices) no longer fixed at a particular level and allowed to increase:
examples: Salaries are now unfrozen after many years of no pay increases at all.
